subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Heat star left after being hit in the nose, but he scored 33 points to help Miami rout Oklahoma City, 103-81, and spoil Russell Westbrook’s return from knee surgery.
snippet: The Heat star left after being hit in the nose, but he scored 33 points to help Miami rout Oklahoma City, 103-81, and spoil Russell Westbrook’s return from knee surgery.
